testcase.name: Within the Salesforce application User is able to create New Account
testcase.system-out: Given User will Open Salesforce Website.....................................passed When verify title for the Salesforce page...................................passed Then user will enter "vedant.jagani@campingworld.com.test" and "Welcome2019*".passed And user click the login button............................................passed And verify title for the Salesforce Home page...............................passed Then user will click on the waffle icon.....................................passed Then user will navigate to the Search field and search for the Account......passed Then user weill verify title for the Account page...........................passed Then user will click on the New button......................................passed Then user will select the Household radio button............................passed Then user will click the Next button within the New Account window..........passed Then user will verify that the required fields message is displayed.........passed Then user will populate fields within the Account Information section "Automation1" and "1234567890" and "101".passed Then user will populate fields within the Address Inforamtion section "101 Chicago St" and "102 Chicago St" and "Chicago" and "S Chicago" and "<billingzipcode>" and "60169".passed Then user will populate fields within the Cloud MDM Information.............passed And Click on the Save button................................................passed
